QuestData.Title: The Defias Kingpin
QuestData.Description: The Shattered Hand has laid mostly quiet for years now.$B$BNo more!$B$BYou will be the instrument of our rebirth, $n. Slay the Defias Kingpin and commandeer her ship for the Horde! We will outfit it as a proper orc warship and use it to finally lay waste to Stormwind$B$BAny survivors will spread word of our unstoppable power across all of Azeroth, and all will tremble before our might!$B$BGo now, VanCleef's death will be your greatest triumph yet hero.
QuestData.RewardText: COWARD!!! Vanessa VanCleef is a dirty human coward! How dare she flee from battle against the Horde and leave her unworthy subordinate to fight!$B$B<Kagtha composes herself.>$B$BNo matter. Her ship is reward enough. The citizens of Stormwind will bear first hand witness to our awe inspiring power using a ship made in part by the very architect of their city!
